short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor and report web app usage with Efficense, optimizing your team's software efficiency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Efficense Chrome Extension offers a comprehensive solution for businesses seeking to enhance their software resource management. By tracking and analyzing how employees utilize web-based applications directly from their browsers, Efficense provides valuable insights into application usage patterns, helping companies optimize their software licenses and improve overall productivity. 

With this tool, IT departments can easily identify underutilized or unnecessary software, enabling strategic decisions to cut costs and allocate resources more effectively. Additionally, the extension aids in ensuring compliance with software licensing agreements and prevents the financial risks associated with unauthorized software use.

Note: For a smooth installation process of the Efficense Extension, we recommend seeking assistance from your company's IT department. Their expertise can help ensure that the extension is configured correctly and integrates seamlessly with your existing IT infrastructure.
